trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*> using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Animates do <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor da moldura chave anterior para as suas próprias <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*>utilizando discreta interpolação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>para animar uma <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de chaves fotogramas.</xref:System.Windows.Thickness> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: Uma fotograma chave define um segmento do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>a que pertence.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada fotograma chave tem um destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>Especifica o tempo no qual a fotograma chave <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>deve ser atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: Uma fotograma chave animates do valor de destino da moldura chave anterior para o seu próprio valor de destino.

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: Começa quando a fotograma chave anterior termina e termina quando for atingido o seu próprio tempo chave.

trans-unit.source: Discrete key frames like DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame create sudden "jumps" between values (no interpolation).
trans-unit.target: Discretas fotogramas chaves como DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame criar repentino "as hiperligações" entre valores (nenhum interpolação).

trans-unit.source: In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached, at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, a propriedade animada não altera até que o tempo de chave da moldura chave for atingido, altura em que a propriedade animada subitamente passa para o valor de destino.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com o valor final especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: O valor final (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com a hora do valor e chave de fim especificada.

trans-unit.source: The ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: O valor final (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: The key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: O tempo chave para o fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: O tempo chave determina quando o valor de destino for atingido, que também é quando a fotograma chave termina.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Interpolates, entre o valor de fotograma chave anterior e o valor da moldura chave atual utilizando interpolação discreta.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 através de 1.0 que especifica a percentagem de tempo decorrido para este frame chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída deste fotograma chave indicado o valor base especificado e o progresso.
